msbt.message: Just wait until I get this place straightened up. I'm gonna have a CRAZY elegant tea party!
UghhhI wish I didn't have to get all this stuff sorted out.There's a whole out there that's just waiting for the Experience!
I'm gonna have a lot of cardboard left over after all thisBut that's OK! You should see the kinds of things folks are building with cardboard these days.
Boy, I've really got to get on cleaning up this place. It's now or never, and I hope it's not never.
Time is money, money is fashion, and fashion is fame. What I'm saying is I've gotta hurry up with this!
Waitwhere'd the day go? I guess I lost track of time sorting through all this stuff.
Oh manonce I start redecorating, I never stop. It's a real problem. Help me!
I can't do ANYTHING until I get all of these boxes unpacked and put away.
It's good to have a vision when you're redecorating, but you have to be realistic too. Like, I know in my mind that a waterslide into a hot tub isn't gonna happen. But, likeI want it.
You know what? I'm calling it. The House of is open for business!
